92.eng-name: Afflictions and the End of the World

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "None of you should point out towards his Muslim brother with a weapon, for he does not know, Satan may tempt him to hit him and thus he would fall into a pit of fire (Hell)

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم " مَنْ حَمَلَ عَلَيْنَا السِّلاَحَ فَلَيْسَ مِنَّا "
chapter.eng-name: “Whosoever takes up arms against us, is not from us.”
